mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member( m_name, m_phone, m_address, m_special) values( #{mName}, #{mPhone}, #{mAddress}, #{mSpecial})
mapper.select: SELECT m_no as mNo, m_name as mName, m_phone as mPhone, m_address as mAddress, m_special as mSpecial FROM member ORDER BY m_no DESC LIMIT #{beginRow},#{pagePerRow}
